text: Anne Kirkbride (21 June 1954 â€“ 19 January 2015) was an English actress. She was best known for portraying the role of Deirdre Barlow in the ITV soap opera Coronation Street from 1972 to 2014. On 19 January 2015, Kirkbride died of breast cancer in a Manchester hospital. She was 60 years old. Before she died, Kirkbride was planning to go back to Coronation Street, but never had the chance to do so. ==References== ==Other websites== * * What's on TV profile Category:1954 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from breast cancer Category:Cancer deaths in England Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:Soap opera actors Category:Actors from Lancashire Category:People from Oldham
title: Anne Kirkbride
